channel.title: Making the shops work in Testscape
channel.description:
First off i would like to say that i do not know if there is another tut on this if there is, im sorry. Did you ever wonder why some of the shops and people in testscape dont work???
Well heres the solution, open up your autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 1001 3245 3429 0 3244 3427 3247 3431 1 Dark Mage[/code] there is an example of a non working npc, now press ctrl+f and the fine that piece of code above, then cut that out from where ever it is in your file and the move it until your code looks like this [code]spawn = 546 3203 3434 0 3204 3437 3201 3431 1 Varrock Staff Shop spawn = 548 3206 3417 0 3208 3421 3202 3414 1 Varrock Cloth Shop spawn = 551 3206 3398 0 3209 3404 3202 3395 1 Varrock Sword Shop Shop Keeper spawn = 552 3206 3398 0 3209 3404 3202 3395 1 Varrock Sword Shop Shop Assitant spawn = 549 3229 3439 0 3232 3442 3225 3433 1 Varrock Armor Shop spawn = 1917 3230 3439 0 3232 3442 3225 3433 1 Bar Seller spawn = 550 3232 3425 0 3235 3427 3230 3421 1 Varrock Archery Shop spawn = 575 3233 3425 0 3235 3427 3230 3421 1 Varrock Dart Seller spawn = 584 2946 3335 0 2946 3337 2944 3332 1 Falador Gem Store spawn = 581 2971 3313 0 2976 3314 2969 3310 1 Falador Chainmail Shop spawn = 1001 3245 3429 0 3244 3427 3247 3431 1 Dark Mage[/code]
and then just find all of the shops that dont work and put them below the dark mage, A.K.A the zamorak mage who teles you into the abyss this also requires you to re-run your sever for it to take effect DONT forget to use tabs and not the space bar
Send me a personal message if you need anymore help :]

item.title: Making the shops work in Testscape
item.dc:creator: @rifflord rifflord
item.description:
@rifflord wrote:

Nice.
A+.
This works perfectly

Read full topic
item.source: Making the shops work in Testscape

item.title: Making the shops work in Testscape
item.dc:creator: @azza123 azza123
item.description:
@azza123 wrote:

First off i would like to say that i do not know if there is another tut on this if there is, im sorry.
Did you ever wonder why some of the shops and people in testscape dont work???

Well heres the solution, open up your autospawn.cfg

spawn = 1001 3245 3429 0 3244 3427 3247 3431 1 Dark Mage there is an example of a non working npc, now press ctrl+f and the fine that piece of code above, then cut that out from where ever it is in your file and the move it until your code looks like this spawn = 546 3203 3434 0 3204 3437 3201 3431 1 Varrock Staff Shop spawn = 548 3206 3417 0 3208 3421 3202 3414 1 Varrock Cloth Shop spawn = 551 3206 3398 0 3209 3404 3202 3395 1 Varrock Sword Shop Shop Keeper spawn = 552 3206 3398 0 3209 3404 3202 3395 1 Varrock Sword Shop Shop Assitant spawn = 549 3229 3439 0 3232 3442 3225 3433 1 Varrock Armor Shop spawn = 1917 3230 3439 0 3232 3442 3225 3433 1 Bar Seller spawn = 550 3232 3425 0 3235 3427 3230 3421 1 Varrock Archery Shop spawn = 575 3233 3425 0 3235 3427 3230 3421 1 Varrock Dart Seller spawn = 584 2946 3335 0 2946 3337 2944 3332 1 Falador Gem Store spawn = 581 2971 3313 0 2976 3314 2969 3310 1 Falador Chainmail Shop spawn = 1001 3245 3429 0 3244 3427 3247 3431 1 Dark Mage

and then just find all of the shops that dont work and put them below the dark mage, A.K.A the zamorak mage who teles you into the abyss
this also requires you to re-run your sever for it to take effect
DONT forget to use tabs and not the space bar

Send me a personal message if you need anymore help :]
